ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of March, 2001, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated January 22, 2001, it is hereby
ORDERED that HAROLD J. MELTZER be and. he is SUSPENDED from the Bar of this Commonwealth for a period of one (1) year and one (1) day, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
